# SummaryStatsPkg

The "SummaryStatsPkg" package provides the summary_statistics function to aid in quick data analysis. It calculates the mean, median, standard deviation and count of all non-NA values for specified numeric columns in a dataframe.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `SummaryStatsPkg` from GitHub with:

```r
devtools::install_github("stat545ubc-2024/SummaryStatsPkg")

```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to use the summary_statistics function:

```{r example}
# Load the package
library(SummaryStatsPkg)

# Example using the palmerpenguins dataset
library(palmerpenguins)
summary_statistics(penguins, columns = c("flipper_length_mm", "body_mass_g"))
```
